## IStandardDebugFlags.DEBUG\_VERBOSE\_MEMORY\_MANAGEMENT property

Enable verbose logging of memory allocations, very chatty.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
DEBUG_VERBOSE_MEMORY_MANAGEMENT: "DEBUG_VERBOSE_MEMORY_MANAGEMENT";
```
